transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (off camera) Ooga booga.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, take off the mask.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (beat) What mask?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (with emphasis) You know. What mask. I'm talking about.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (beat) No I don't.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes you do, you're wearing it right now!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (beat) No I'm not. (Jumps out his keyboard pod)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (shouting) Come back here, you godforsaken mantis! (runs after Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (evil laughter)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (off camera) You DO have a mask!

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Shake power activate!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (holding Zorak) Alright! Um... Mister Shake is here...

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: MASTER Shake. Master is my name, and thirst is what I tame.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What is that, and what's it doing here?

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: I am dethirstifying the perimeter!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, yeah, Zorak, obviously.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Aqua Teen Hunger Force, assemble.

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: Frylock, the hunger hater 'tater.

transcript.speaker: Meatwad
transcript.dialogue: Meatwad, ball of compressed meat. The bun is in your mind.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: And together we are.. (in unison)

transcript.speaker: All
transcript.dialogue: Aqua Teen Hunger Force!

transcript.speaker: Meatwad
transcript.dialogue: The bun is in your mind.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Meatwad, stand down!

transcript.speaker: Meatwad
transcript.dialogue: But it is, it's in your mind.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What's with the stupid food puppets?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, they're a delicious meal, from Burger Trench.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Burger Trench? I found a bone in my shake there.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Mmm mmm!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, man. It was human.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: And my dipping sauce had ticks in it.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: The mantis mocks our mission! (Leaps onto Space Ghost's desk) We battle hunger with nutritious salt and oil-based weapons.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, Zorak, that's what they do.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: And that's what you do from now on.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh... sure, man, whatever.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Not "whatever", forever!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Just.. get down from my desk, would ya?

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Frylock, cast your potato magic, I sense hungry teens!

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: (shouts) I can use the amulet of Ayahockalise!

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: (to Zorak) Could you get off that amulet please, I sense, I need to sense hungry teens with it.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'm butterin' it.

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: With your, with your foot on it, it's really messin' me up.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: With foot sweat.

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: (shouts) I can't get to it, please get off of it!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, get off the man's.. thing.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Frylock, unsheath your edible blade (pronounces it "blahde").

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: (pulls out a blade, which looks like a french fry) Stand aside, insect, or I shall strike you down, with my battered wedge forged in corn oil.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Gimme that! (grabs Frylock's "blade" and eats it)

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: (shouts) Master Shake, he ate the fry sword!

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Then we have ourselves a tasty little problem then, don't we? (Jumps down from the desk) Don't we!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay Zorak, we're all a team now.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: An Aqua Team.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And there's no "I" in team.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: But there is an "A". In team.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (Beat) Right, which means, probably, partially whatever you do should.. be okay.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: No, never! Your mantis is violating the contract.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Alright, I'm lost. What contract? What are we talkin' about?

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Enjoying your houseboat? Mmm?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (quietly) Uh, would you mind not just bringing that up right now?

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (loudly) No! Let's talk about it! Loudly.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: So THAT'S how you got that houseboat! (Cut to shot of exterior of Ghost Planet Industries building; a houseboat is floating outside)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You sold us out for promotional considerations!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: And a houseboat!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I didn't sell you out for a hou-

transcript.speaker: Meatwad
transcript.dialogue: (in Space Ghost's mind) The bun is in your mind!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (beat) I also received two cool speakers.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (wide-eyed) Are they surround sound?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well...

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: "It." Is "it" surround sound. And no, "it" is not.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Whoa. Hold on a second. There's only one?

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: You will receive the second speaker upon the elimination of all hunger.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You sold us out!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: For a crummy houseboat.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And one serious speaker! Look, guys, we're still doin' the show. We're just takin' it in a new direction, that's all.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Yes, a delicious direction!

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: At least directly to Burger Trench.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Now with three convenient locations.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: That was good. *I* want to turn invisible, and I want jets.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look, let's just get the guest out here, okay?

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (moving between SG and the camera) Yes! Bring forth the guest.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What do you do? You, you fight hunger, or, is hunger your villain, or...

transcript.speaker: Meatwad
transcript.dialogue: Master Shake is the almighty frozen drink.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, forget about that guy for a second.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (shuffles into control room) What is going on in here? We fight hunger and that is all you need to know, lever man. To us, you are very small. We are huge, lever man.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Lever man, don't mess this up for me.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Mess what up?

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Oh! Someone doesn't know about the...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, Master Shake...

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: ... limited edition collector's cup deal.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, no, no! Hey, Master Shake, we...

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Collect all four! From the entire Space Ghost gang. Space Ghost, Zorak, Brak and ...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (waits expectantly)

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: ... the NASCAR driver Rusty Wallace.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (shouts) Where's my cup!!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, uh... how can I put this? (sighs) You scare children.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I'm the only one that wears a cup.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: True... but you wear it in a bad place. And, you never rinse it properly.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: How would you know?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Because I drank from it. And believe me, it smells, buster.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: The Moltar cup didn't test well. It's yucky. Children didn't want to put their lips to it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah. So send Willie out here.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Do it, lever man. You know I'm the master. (shuffles out of the control room).

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: (screams) Master, he took my eye!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why would you do that, Zorak? (piano music begins in background) Just because he doesn't look like you?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, that's a reason.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, just because someone's different, doesn't give you the right to remove their face with your mouth. Your filthy, green mouth that is so odd and jagged. Y'know, sometimes I wonder...

transcript.speaker: Colonial Man
transcript.dialogue: (in Space Ghost's mind) Between two steamed buns!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wait a minute. (blood runs from his nose under his mask)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts Zorak with his power bands) (chuckles) Been a while since you had one of those, hasn't it? Hee hee hee..

transcript.speaker: Willie Nelson
transcript.dialogue: Hello.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Up the chain, Willie.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (moves between Space Ghost and the camera) Greetings, alien. I am Master Shake.

transcript.speaker: Willie Nelson
transcript.dialogue: Where d'you get them clothes? (sips from his mug)

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: This is a cup, which contains my chocolate inner being.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (peeks from behind Shake) Hey. Hey! I'm doing the interview here.

transcript.speaker: Willie Nelson
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Willie, this is a cup, which contains my chocolate inner being.

transcript.speaker: Willie Nelson
transcript.dialogue: Hey, there you go, who do you fight?

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (on Space Ghost's desk) Go ahead, Ghost, tell him what you fight.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Um... I, fight hunger, Willie.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Louder! Be proud of what we make you do!

transcript.speaker: Willie Nelson
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Crime down these days?

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (shuffles toward camera) It's a crime not to pick up a Master Shake! Now in artificial flavors somewhat similar to strawberry. We have a commercial which depicts this crime, perhaps you've seen it. But I'll describe it for you.

transcript.speaker: Meatwad
transcript.dialogue: See, I'm the pieces of meat that weren't good enough to make the hamburger.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, how do people even hold you?

transcript.speaker: Meatwad
transcript.dialogue: Well, you know, the bun? See, that's in your mind. So they gotta use bare hands.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: God!

transcript.speaker: Meatwad
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, they're gonna rip out my eyes and thread an easy-grip handle through the holes. Please, God, kill me.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Then they go to a Burger Trench and order one of my shakes, because they cannot fight the hunger inside. It imprisons them. You can tell that they are burglars because they wear masks over their eyes and they have striped suites. Then we show them being arrested. The ad is long...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Willie...

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: ... and it is in surround sound.

transcript.speaker: Willie Nelson
transcript.dialogue: What planet are you from?

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: The planet of flavor.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Willie! Hey, Willie!

transcript.speaker: Willie Nelson
transcript.dialogue: Hey, how ya doin', Tex?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm the host of the show. Not the cup.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Over here! Look at me! Initiate hunger imagery!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look, when we first talked, we said that you would be running through occasionally with your food friends.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: That is correct, because we are action heroes, and running is action. (runs to center screen) Mommas, let your babies grow up to drink Master Shakes. Willie, get on the road again, for a kid's Baffler Meal.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! This is outside the scope of what we talked about.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (On Moltar's monitor) I am always on your mind.

transcript.speaker: Meatwad
transcript.dialogue: The bun is IN your mind.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Oh, sweet delight! Meatwad has spoken again. Yes, keep chanting that ad line, Meatwad. How about this one: Reward yourself by eating a wad of decayed meat with an oasis of greasy honey mustard filling -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Will you just shut up for three seconds!

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (after silence of approximately three seconds) Yes, silence is golden.

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: Like my delicious golden fries!

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: They come with a kid's Baffler Meal. Baffle yourself with flavor.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, we heard you!

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (Beat) They haven't heard what the box is -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What? What is it? What is the box? Please, tell us what it is, because you're gonna do it anyway, tell us all about the box, please.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (looking down) It's a maze and coloring book.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, thank God!

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (shuffling off stage) I guess we know who doesn't want a house boat.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I- I- I..  well, come on, I didn't mean that.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you sure yelled it loud enough.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (contrite) Please don't take away Proud Larry.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (shuffles back on stage) Then pronounce your love for me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Y'know, this, this wasn't part of the deal.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Bow down, and I will dominate you. That's the deal.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Now hold on, Master Shake.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Is it clear who's in charge in here?

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: Hail, Master Shake! Warrior of the Night!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (in overacting voice) You need to chill out, and shut your lid, cup! Or else it'll be time to shake it up! (Beat) And the drinks are on me. (Beat) 'Cause I'm... tired of milkin' this shake. (Beat) And there's no... free refills this time.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (nods)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Excuse me, ma'am, but the machine seems to be out of ice, and... I just purchased this. (Aims his power bands at Master Shake)

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (looks down, silently)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Let me... let me rework this. (flys off, then returns) (Long pause) (He pushes Master Shake over, whose lid pops off, and chocolate shake spills onto the floor)

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: You have stopped the flavor!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, I did! Because I don't even have a boating license! I suppose I could get one. (looks toward Frylock) But still!

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: Look, just chill out. Don't shoot. Don't shoot, please. Really, I'm just a ...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Time to have some refried fries, fry man! (aims his power bands)

transcript.speaker: Frylock
transcript.dialogue: ... this is a rented suit! (gets blasted by Space Ghost, and disappears in a cloud of smoke)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (looking like Meatwad) The bun is in your mind.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Meatwad! Meat dead? Make dead meat more like it! (aims his power bands)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (talking fast) No wait, don't shoot, don't shoot, it's me, Moltar! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (lowers his power bands)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, see, uh, he was beggin' to die, so I mangled him, ate him, and put on his skin as a joke. (laughs nervously). Eh?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And you're wondering why you didn't get the cup with your little face on it.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (wails, closes his eyes). I'm dead.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I guess that's the end of your little-

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: (opens his eyes) Oh wait. Before I ascend into heaven free of all sin, I have a few other thoughts I'd like to share.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pounds his fist on his desk)

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Since I will no longer be working in television, which will sadden advertisers, and prevent me from appearing with Guns N' Roses, at Phillips First Union Center in January, Yep, because I'll be dead. (Beat) I think I said that earlier. So, to summarize... classic rock will be forever changed.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh no.

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: And I'm making a movie with Axl Rose. It starts off in the desert...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Quickly, to the house boat! (flies off)

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: ... where we are both hungry, and scorpions roam the earth.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Everybody buckled in? (Beat) To the club! (flies off)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Four dollars? For what?

transcript.speaker: Colonial Man
transcript.dialogue: (sings) Hey baby, say the way you quake, gonna break it down for Master Shake.You got a thirst you wanna quench, come on down to Burger Trench!Eat yourself a big meatwad with honey mustard dipping sauce!You want an affordable place to dine, feed your kids for three ninety nine!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What have I done to the future of classic rock!

transcript.speaker: Colonial Man
transcript.dialogue: (sings) Hey baby, oh baby, pretty baby... Now we're gonna break it down!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (over "Ghost Planet Industries" logo) Noooooo!!!!

transcript.speaker: Master Shake
transcript.dialogue: Hello, God? Are you there? Is this heaven? Or am I in television?
